attributes.action: Close Drinking Venues After the Hours of 02:30am Fri and saturday and Midnight on all Other Nights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The aim of this petition is to stop the uncontrolled drinking of young people.
Many town centres have drinking venues open until 7 am the following morning.
The majority of people at these venues are the younger more vunerable members of our society.With very little peer pressure form more mature adults.
